snippet: Roadway fatalities increased in the first six months of 2012, according to federal data, indicating reductions over the last six years may not be sustained through the calendar year.
abstract: Roadway fatalities increased in the first six months of 2012, according to federal data, indicating reductions over the last six years may not be sustained through the calendar year.

headline.main: After Six Years of Decline, Traffic Deaths Begin to Inch Upward
headline.print_headline: Traffic Deaths Begin to Inch Upward
